# GKMatchType.peerToPeer

**Case**

A peer-to-peer match hosted by Game Center.

## Declaration

```swift
case peerToPeer
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKMatch] object represents a peer-to-peer match.

## Types

- **GKMatchType.hosted**: A match hosted on your private server.
- **GKMatchType.turnBased**: A turn-based match hosted by Game Center.
